title: User attempted to book a flight to London, struggled with date specificity.
user_intent: Book a round-trip flight from New York to London for specific dates in October.
what_we_did: Understood request for a round-trip flight.
Attempted to parse ambiguous date requests (e.g., 'second week of next month').
what_worked: Successfully captured origin and destination cities.
what_failed: Struggled to precisely determine departure and return dates from user's natural language input.
Could not present suitable flight options due to date ambiguity or unavailability for initial broad search.
constraints: Budget: 'Not too expensive' (no specific numerical limit provided yet).
next_steps: Search for round-trip flights from New York to London departing on 2023-10-09 and returning on 2023-10-13.
If exact dates are unavailable or too expensive, suggest alternative dates within +/- 2 days.
Prompt user for a specific budget range to refine search results.
instructions_for_next_model: Confirm the precise departure and return dates (Oct 9-13) with the user before performing the search.
Prioritize direct flights in the search results.
If initial search yields no results or expensive options, proactively offer flexible date alternatives.
Explicitly ask the user for their maximum acceptable price for the flight.
